text:
so what we have here is one and a half 
tablespoons of sticky rice raw sticky

rice you can do this with jasmine rice as well 
but traditionally that's what they use in a dry

saute pan you're just going to I think it's this 
one you're just going to toast it on medium high

heat and you want to keep it moving and what 
you're looking for is for it to start turning

golden brown and this should take a few minutes 
okay so that's pretty much what you're looking

for a deep golden brown and now it's going to 
smell it's gonna add a very nice toasty aroma

that's very unique to this dish now we're going 
to grind this up into a powder and you can use

a coffee grinder or you can use a heavy duty 
mortar and pestle like this one here and just

gonna start pounding now only make as much as 
you need because the fragrance is very fleeting

unless you're gonna use in the next few days or 
within the week I would just make only as much

as you will need today and just make it again 
next time it's really easy and fast to make
